summary: This is an email chain between attorneys discussing scheduling a call regarding a letter about Ghislaine Maxwell's discovery and prison conditions. The correspondence shows legal team coordination on Maxwell's case.

keyFacts: The document shows legal team coordination regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case in September 2020.
A letter was sent on September 21, 2020 regarding Maxwell's discovery and prison conditions.
Multiple attorneys including Christian Everdell, Mark S. Cohen, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca were involved in the correspondence.
The email chain shows scheduling of a call to discuss the letter about Maxwell's case.
The document originates from Cohen & Gresser law firm based at 800 Third Avenue, New York.
